name: tamanu
description: This repo contains all the packages for Tamanu
author: Beyond Essential Systems Pty. Ltd.

scripts.web-unit-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/web-frontend run test
scripts.web-unit-test-watch: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/web-frontend run test-watch
scripts.facility-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/facility-server run test
scripts.facility-start-dev: yarn run build-shared && yarn run watch-shared-and @tamanu/facility-server start-dev
scripts.facility-migrate: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate up" yarn run facility-start-dev
scripts.facility-migrate-down: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate down" yarn run facility-start-dev
scripts.shared-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/shared run test
scripts.central-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/central-server run test
scripts.central-shell: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/central-server run shell
scripts.central-start-dev: yarn run build-shared && yarn run watch-shared-and @tamanu/central-server start-dev
scripts.central-migrate: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate" yarn run central-start-dev
scripts.central-migrate-down: yarn run build-shared && TAMANU_ARGS="migrate down" yarn run central-start-dev
scripts.meta-test: yarn run build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/meta-server run test
scripts.build-report: yarn build-shared && yarn workspace @tamanu/central-server build && yarn workspace @tamanu/central-server start report
